New coin supply is 500,000,000,000 DOCT, while previous one was 38,053,991.8325 DOCT and they are selling on IEO for 0.97$/token 5. There's no way to communicate with the scammers because they have a telegram in read-only and on socials they delete comments.  When btc rallies a bit scammers show up again, classic!

Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡

Author: DocTailor
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: The structure of the documents will be created by DocTailor or the individuals using the platform.  Document structuring is a key feature of DocTailor: Legal documents, agreements and contracts that require tailor-made structuring can be created in short time depending on the context of the document required.  So is Document formatting these will allow the creation of the documents required: Documents created on the platform can be downloaded in a variety of formats for external use. Those formats include Word, HTML, XML and PDF.  DocTailor will be used globally and accessible by any individual or organization that wishes to use the platform.   Quote from: FrederickFarci on February 19, 2018, 07:13:12 AM I would like to see Whitepaper... But project looks great! Good luck, guys)  Hi,  Thanks for your interest, please read over our whitepaper here www.doctailor.com/whitepaper-en.pdf  Once you have a read give us your feedback!

Author: DocTailor
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: We do not have any direct competition in the realm of cryptocurrencies that use smart contracts and blockchain technology. However, there are some firms such as Docusign and LegalZoom that are already operating. We will be able to improve in the areas that they are insufficient in and become a more widely accessible platform that is much more cost-effective.

Author: Lucasolofsson85
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡

Author: DocTailor
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: Yes, this is a true statement. For optimal success with any platform in 2018 and going forward, building mobile applications is almost always a must.  However, based on the DocTailor system and the purpose it leads to serve, the question begs if our user base needs will be in line with the creation on legal contracts and mobile application to services their needs. Until qualitative research is conducted we cannot be sure with absolute certainty. With contractual agreements typically not being something that was previously created on the go, it is tough to say if such a need would be demanded.  Thanks   Quote from: Lucasolofsson85 on February 19, 2018, 11:58:13 AM Sound good! the project will be in demand, as it seems to me)) what is the minimum amount of the investment?  Thank you for the great support!  There is no minimum investment amount currently. We welcome all investors from any region of the world to make DocTailor the best platform that it can be.     Quote from: skattio on February 19, 2018, 01:30:16 PM Hello DocTailor team,  I’ll be happy to see you on Skatt listing platform! You will be able to register for free and show your project to the world. Information about our platform on BitcoinTalk.  Good luck with your ICO guys!  Thank you for the support!  We look forward to getting listed

Author: DocTailor
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: Thanks for your support.  The platform will operate as a place where individuals or businesses can come and create smart legal agreements. We are focused on reducing the cost and time that comes with the creation of these contracts. Currently, the legal industry is very much in a state of stagnation where we are not actively using the technology that is openly accessible to use to improve business speed or reduce overhead. DocTailor is capitalizing on the soon to be multi-trillion dollar crypto economy and bridging it with the non-crypto businesses to access the multi-trillion dollar cryptocurrency economy.  If you are a user of the platform:   All created smart tailor-made agreements and contracts on the platform will continuously earn authors income, who opt-in to having their document made available to other users looking for similar requirements.   Easy, fast, cost‐effective access to useful, complex contracts that deliver useful functionality and create business opportunities.  Every token used on the platform instead of fiat currency, adds extra time to the user's account. Token users are awarded bonuses; in the form of access to exclusive smart document templates and free-feature time.  There is a growing demand from business executive to use blockchain technology but are less inclined due to the accessibility of knowledge and appropriate platform. DocTailor is here to alleviate the confusion and open doors for businesses to expand operations with crypto businesses in the present and the future   DocTailor has officially set a date to start its Pre ICO  February 28th the sale begins!  Early investors earn up to a 40% bonus  1 ETH= ~2700 DOCT Tokens  The self-customizable Smart contracts and agreement software on the blockchain will launch its platform in Q4 of 2018!

Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: Hi Guys,  Looks like a good idea but still difficult to get the practical use. Could you perhaps give an example of how law firm will be using it?

Author: DocTailor
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: Every contract produced on the platform will be looked over by a practicing legal professional. Agreements will also be abled to be altered if both parties mutually agree. This way disputes can be efficiently resolved.   Quote from: The_Hu on February 24, 2018, 05:28:42 AM What is the main purpore of this Doc Tailor project? And where can I see the support team?  The ultimate purpose of the DocTailor project is to have as many businesses and users on the platform and eventually launch an ultimate smart contract for the DOCT Token to a preferred payment token between sellers and buyers.  DocTailor as a platform will have the opportunity to be in many different industries as DocTailor's foundation is the focus of facilitation in as many different professions and industries as possible.  The full team and our experience can be found here https://www.doctailor.com/#team   Quote from: khroma on February 24, 2018, 12:28:10 PM Exactly what is the use of blockchain to the project, and what solution is it brings or what problem is it fixing, what value is it bringing to the cryptospace.   The blockchain will be used to store the Hash of any agreement or legally binding contract on the platform. The problem we are ultimately trying to address is to bridge the gap between crypto holders/users and high street retailers wanting to accept crypto as a genuine form of payment.

Author: mokeyking
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡

Body: Imagine you want to place a charge on a property and issue crypto to the current owner of the property, a  lawyer or firm will be able to draw up such a legal agreement with a smart contract in place tying you and the property owing to a legal binding agreement.   Quote from: mokeyking on February 24, 2018, 02:49:40 PM Are you the CEO of this project?  I am one of the key members for communications of the DocTailor ICO.  Although the CEO does come here on occasions he is much to busy to come here on a daily basis. I hope I can a be good enough substitution

Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: That is our intentions!  Thank you for the support. We are looking to disrupt the legal industry and apply our technology for immediate business application   Just Updated our Signature Campaigns Requirements   Signature Sign up Form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1jIbFJGvry06oE4t-krE7pHip2fMnlpGRo_XLqmq-HY0/edit  Signature Response Form: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nSHcEZJGFeyBTpDIRtYuM6CL3Wkjs9a4d1tcU1ETqfs/edit#gid=2060953742  1. To take part in the Signature Bounty campaign, apply with this form.  2. The signature codes and avatar can be found here.  3. The signature must be held until the end of the campaign (TBA). If you remove the signature in the middle of the campaign, you will be disqualified.  4. We expect you to post at least 10 constructive posts per week. only 3 of these post can be in local boards.   5. Posts must be constructive and on-topic. Spamming, low-quality posts, copy/pasted text, and off-topic posts will not qualify.  6. Spammers and multi-account users will be banned and disqualified.  7. Receiving negative trust ratings or being banned during your participation in the campaign will get you disqualified.  8. Accounts with negative trust ratings are not accepted.  9.  Users will receive varying amounts of DOCS token according to their rank. The rank is fixed when you apply and cannot be changed during the campaign. Author: havicvotre
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: DocTailor is a unique custom contract law customization platform, which allows, lawyers, individuals, and organizations to post and make smart contracts and deals tailored to the law of blockchain. this is what makes it interesting so there is no data term missing and so forth. this kind of project should be pushed as much as possible

I think this is a very good idea , this is an attraction .. I think this project will be a great project and desirable .. I hope this project can be achieved target

Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: Although people aren't ready for this kind of smart contract base legal contracts to be able to make them by themselves due to many issues. At the same time good thing is blockchain is becoming famous and enthusiasm in people is also rising. A fraction of whole legal contract industry if starts in future this platform it is more than sufficient. Smart contract are being used already and we are heading towards full deployment of them. I see potential for this platform to become giant in this industry.

Author: zloadr
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: Thanks for reaching out! We would definitely require your services shortly...   Quote from: gobisirom on February 07, 2018, 09:55:43 AM wow a nice and unique project that adjusts smart legal contracts. i want to know what the main purpose of this project is?  It's quite simple. Help individuals, businesses and entrepreneurs accept cryptocurrency, where they may need a legal agreement between themselves and the entity they are trading with via a smart contract.    Have you all read the latest news about DocTailor that was just published on Cointelegraph?  https://cointelegraph.com/press-releases/new-smart-contract-platform-doctailor-brings-blockchain-to-businesses

Author: zloadr
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: Thank you for the support!  The current soft cap is going to be set a $1,000,000 The hard cap is presently set at $40,000,000     Quote from: AndrewBUD on February 10, 2018, 11:45:09 PM You can talk more about tokens DOCT and DocTIME. What advantage do they give? In whitepaper, this question is poorly described. What means "time" on your platform   Great question.  The DOCT tokens will be specifically utilized with the DocTailor platform. Any user of DOCT tokens will have access to use the platform. The term "DOC time" refers to that time. The coin of the phrase comes from users having "time to create documents".  Each token will enable the users to have a set amount of time to use the platform.  The more amount of tokens paid to use the platform at a given time will enable users to have an increase of time to use the platform.  I hope that this brings more light into the "Doc Time" question.  We are happy to answer any more questions that anyone has

Author: Boing7898
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: Will you involve large law firms in cooperation? If yes, who for example? Or are you planning to set up your own company?

Author: zloadr
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: That is our intention.  We would with working with large law firms, by doing so DocTailor can help to reduce their overhead significantly. We have a few big-time law firms in the pipeline but the sauce cannot be fully given yet  The goal is to compete with the current legal framework and in doing that we will be challenging law firms that fight the innovation that DocTailor brings to the industry.   Quote from: Varyg on February 11, 2018, 04:43:45 AM Will ZDR holders receive any bonuses after the launch of DOCTAILOR, as announced before? Or situation now changed? Thanks for any answer  That was an early intention. This could still be done but for the moment nothing is official regarding the two separate tokens.

Author: wasabi.domo
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: Great idea for a smart contract. There's so much value here in low complexity high volume legal transactions. Crossing international borders will be a challenge but you have to start somewhere.

Author: zloadr
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: Each token used within the platform gives you a set amount of time to use the platform. In theory, if you simply log in pay a certain amount of tokens that give you an allotted time you do open yourself up to the possibility that at least some duration of your token will be used. However, some portion of the remaining time can be saved via time inactivity log out feature implementation.   Quote from: wasabi.domo on February 11, 2018, 12:41:56 PM Great idea for a smart contract. There's so much value here in low complexity high volume legal transactions. Crossing international borders will be a challenge but you have to start somewhere.  Yes, we are laying the foundation for legal contracts. Of course, entering different legal jurisdictions can create issues if due diligence is not properly executed.  To your point about the high volume of legal transactions; we shed light in our whitepaper that many businesses have yet to incorporate smart contracts into their businesses. DocTailor will be able to highlight that the technology will be able to increase efficiency and reduce cost both useful functions that create business opportunities.

Author: kusumadewi
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: Will dividends be provided to the holders of the tokens? If yes, what will they be paid in - DOCT or other crypto currency?

Author: tarolog
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: Who will create the contract templates? Can users create their own template ? Will the contracts be certified by a legally - on paper?   Once more question: To register a contract, both parties must be registered on the platform? That is, contracts are concluded only between participants who are already present on DOCTAILOR?

Author: zloadr
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: 5% of total revenue derived from the platform is allocated to all DOCT token holders every quarter. The payment will be made in DOCT tokens  At the same time, authors of these certified contracts will be able to earn a royalty fee for every time their contract is used.    Quote from: tarolog on February 12, 2018, 01:20:31 AM Who will create the contract templates? Can users create their own template ? Will the contracts be certified by a legally - on paper?   DocTailor will implement some of the templates while others will be created by the marketplace. All contracts will be stored on the blockchain so that can be accessed quickly.  Before any contract can be accessed by a third party for use or a new contract can be created for legal use it will be approved and certified by a legal professional to ensure the legality of the contract.   Quote from: tarolog on February 12, 2018, 06:56:22 AM Once more question: To register a contract, both parties must be registered on the platform? That is, contracts are concluded only between participants who are already present on DOCTAILOR?  No. both parties will not have to be registered to the platform. Only the party the initiates the signing of the documentation will really need to have access to the platform.   For example, it is like saying that both parties must talk to the same lawyer in order for a contact to be initiated, which is incorrect.  One party is required to start the process, make the necessary clauses and wording of the contract. The second party would only need to read, approve and sign the contract.  Great questions guys, keep them coming!

Author: blogardianz
Title: ⚡⚡⚡⚡[ANN] [IEO] DocTailor (DOCT) - Jul 20th, 2019 to Sept 20th, 2019⚡⚡⚡⚡
Body: Hello,  I went to your site and confuse about something, what is "Pokens"? Is it new terms? or just typo? see-> https://imgur.com/a/1wW3m
